item.description:
Dave will demonstrate the fantastic and cool features of drupal:
installation
configuration
tour
about drupal:
http://drupal.org/abo...

If you want to use try drupal you download apache and mysql (free download) first.
http://www.wampserver... (if you have windows operating system and pc)
If you run Lynix on pc or use mac your download will be different I will add when I find the links.

Then Drupal:
http://drupal.org/dru...
